# Elfin

## Catalog  
* Background introduction
* Project introduction
* Instructions
  * Get code 
* Documentation
* Update record

## Background introduction  
*Elfin* Elfin a high-performance micro ORM that supports SQL Server and MySQL, Elfin has no dependencies other than other.

## Project introduction  
*Elfin* the original intention of Elfin design is to provide a class library that can be extended conveniently and efficiently operated.

## Instructions 

### Get code  
* github: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Elfin/
The code on the GIT will continue to be updated.

To install Elfin, run the following command in the Package Manager Console 
* nuget: PM> Install-Package Elfin -Version 1.0.0  

## Documentation
* https://www.nuget.org/packages/Elfin/
